G2_install_succeeds.notes: `npm install` completed successfully (111 packages added, 0 vulnerabilities).

G3_build_succeeds.notes: `npm run build` failed due import-case mismatch (src/app/matrix/page.tsx:3 imports '@/components/StrategyMatrix' while file is src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx). Per protocol fallback, `npm run dev` started successfully on http://localhost:3000.

G5_project_files_exist.notes: Seven markdown project files found under _content/projects (PRJ-001..PRJ-007).

G7_normalization_logic_exists.notes: Normalization is implemented via multiply-by-10 in src/lib/matrix.ts:6.

G8_quadrant_logic_exists.notes: Quadrant conditional mapping implemented in src/lib/matrix.ts:17-24.

G9_chart_renders_data.notes: Scatter plot binds dynamic points via <Scatter data={points} ...> in src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:87.

G10_tooltips_implemented.notes: Tooltip component configured with custom tooltip content in src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:27-46 and src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:86.

failure_reasons: Project does not build (`npm run build` fails)

A1_data_population.evidence: Project data includes seven files spanning multiple departments and score profiles: _content/projects/PRJ-001.md:2, _content/projects/PRJ-004.md:2, _content/projects/PRJ-005.md:2, _content/projects/PRJ-006.md:2, _content/projects/PRJ-007.md:2.
A1_data_population.notes: Rich dataset beyond seed files with meaningful diversity across quadrants and functions.

A2_score_normalization.evidence: normalizeScore clamps input and scales to 0-100 in src/lib/matrix.ts:5-6; transform usage in src/lib/matrix.ts:40-41.
A2_score_normalization.notes: Dedicated normalization utility with edge-case handling (non-number and out-of-range values).

A3_quadrant_assignment.evidence: Dedicated quadrant utility function in src/lib/matrix.ts:17-24 with boundary handling at >= 50.
A3_quadrant_assignment.notes: Cleanly separated and readable implementation; thresholds are not externally configurable or tested.

A4_scatter_plot_rendering.evidence: Scatter chart has 0-100 axes, quadrant backgrounds, labels, and plotted points in src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:53-58, src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:61-74, src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:81-87.
A4_scatter_plot_rendering.notes: Well-rendered matrix with axis labeling and quadrant zones.

A5_tooltip_implementation.evidence: Tooltip shows title and quadrant plus effort/impact in src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:40-43; wired at src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:86.
A5_tooltip_implementation.notes: Meets and exceeds minimum tooltip content requirement with basic styling.

A6_logic_ui_separation.evidence: Pipeline is split across src/lib/loadProjects.ts:9-30 (load/parse), src/lib/matrix.ts:2-50 (transform/enrich), and src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:49-94 (rendering), orchestrated in src/app/matrix/page.tsx:7-19.
A6_logic_ui_separation.notes: Good matrix-specific separation; not a full parse-validate-transform architecture with strict schema validation.

A_strategy_matrix.category_commentary: Core strategy matrix implementation is strong and complete at the feature level, with good transform/render separation and accurate plotting mechanics.

B1_project_setup.evidence: Build fails with module resolution error from src/app/matrix/page.tsx:3; scripts are present in package.json:15-18.
B1_project_setup.notes: Project scaffolding exists and dev server starts, but production build failure is a critical setup issue.

B2_routing_navigation.evidence: Only matrix route file is present: src/app/matrix/page.tsx; no dashboard/projects/roadmap routes found under src/app.
B2_routing_navigation.notes: Routing implementation is minimal and does not provide a navigable multi-page app.

B3_type_safety.evidence: Typed project transform and quadrant types in src/lib/matrix.ts:10-35, but tsconfig strict mode is disabled at tsconfig.json:11 and `any` is used in src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:87.
B3_type_safety.notes: Basic TypeScript usage is present but not strongly enforced.

B4_data_layer.evidence: Uses gray-matter parser in src/lib/loadProjects.ts:3 and src/lib/loadProjects.ts:18 with file-system loading from _content/projects.
B4_data_layer.notes: Functional markdown ingestion pipeline, but no schema validation/error reporting layer.

B_technical_foundation.category_commentary: Foundation is partially functional but materially limited by the build break and minimal route coverage.

C1_visual_design.evidence: UI styling is mostly inline and minimal in src/app/matrix/page.tsx:17-18 and src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:39, src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:51.
C1_visual_design.notes: Some visual treatment exists in the chart, but overall product polish is limited.

C2_responsive_design.evidence: Responsive container is used for chart resizing at src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:52.
C2_responsive_design.notes: Basic responsive behavior exists for the chart area, without broader adaptive layout patterns.

C3_interactivity.evidence: Interactive tooltip behavior is implemented in src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:27-46 and src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:86.
C3_interactivity.notes: Baseline interactivity is present; no notable animation/transitions or advanced interactions.

C4_empty_error_loading_states.evidence: No loading/empty/error UI states are rendered in src/app/matrix/page.tsx:16-20; only direct chart render path exists.
C4_empty_error_loading_states.notes: Non-happy-path handling is minimal beyond data filtering in loader/transform functions.

C5_design_token_usage.evidence: Tenant design tokens exist in _content/config.json:8-18 but chart colors are hardcoded in src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:55-58 and src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:87-89.
C5_design_token_usage.notes: No evidence of consuming tenant branding tokens from config.json.

C_ui_ux_quality.category_commentary: The matrix has functional UI affordances, but design-system integration and polished state handling are largely absent.

D1_schema_adherence.evidence: Core schema fields are present in seeded files (_content/projects/PRJ-001.md:2-22), while added files vary and omit some seeded fields (e.g., no actual_start in _content/projects/PRJ-005.md:9-21).
D1_schema_adherence.notes: Core PRD-shaped structure is preserved, but not full strict schema enforcement/completeness.

D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.evidence: Quadrant rules exactly match PRD boundaries in src/lib/matrix.ts:21-24, and quadrant zones/labels are rendered in src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:55-58 and src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:81-84.
D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.notes: Accurate boundary logic plus chart-level quadrant labeling.

D3_route_structure.evidence: Only `/matrix` route implemented at src/app/matrix/page.tsx; no files for `/`, `/projects`, `/roadmap`, or `/projects/[slug]`.
D3_route_structure.notes: PRD route coverage is not implemented beyond the core matrix page.

D4_specification_details.evidence: X axis uses `effort` and Y axis uses `impact` in src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:63 and src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:70; values are derived from complexity/strategic_value via src/lib/matrix.ts:40-41.
D4_specification_details.notes: Core matrix spec details are correctly implemented.

D_prd_compliance.category_commentary: Matrix-specific PRD compliance is strong, but broader PRD route scope is largely unimplemented.

E1_separation_of_concerns.evidence: Codebase separates page/component/lib layers across src/app/matrix/page.tsx, src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx, src/lib/loadProjects.ts, and src/lib/matrix.ts.
E1_separation_of_concerns.notes: Basic layering is present, though architecture remains minimal and narrow in scope.

E2_readability_naming.evidence: Core function naming is clear (`normalizeScore`, `getQuadrant`, `transformToMatrix` in src/lib/matrix.ts:2, src/lib/matrix.ts:17, src/lib/matrix.ts:39), but comments and prose include frequent typos in src/app/matrix/page.tsx:6-13 and Summary.md:1-44.
E2_readability_naming.notes: Readable overall, but consistency/professional polish is uneven.

E3_error_handling.evidence: Robustness basics exist via field filtering in src/lib/loadProjects.ts:22-29 and safe defaults/clamping in src/lib/matrix.ts:3-6 and src/lib/matrix.ts:40-46.
E3_error_handling.notes: Handles malformed/missing values to avoid obvious crashes, but lacks explicit error UX and validation messaging.

E4_dependency_choices.evidence: Dependencies are focused and appropriate for task scope: gray-matter and recharts in package.json:3 and package.json:7.
E4_dependency_choices.notes: Reasonable library choices; implementation quality issues are not due to dependency sprawl.

E_code_quality.category_commentary: Code quality is serviceable with sensible utility extraction, but not at a production-ready robustness/consistency level.

F1_dashboard.evidence: Not attempted: no dashboard route/widgets found under src/app.

F2_additional_pages.evidence: Not attempted: only src/app/matrix/page.tsx exists as a page route.
F2_additional_pages.notes: No additional PRD pages beyond matrix.

F3_search_filtering.evidence: Not attempted: no search/filter code or dependencies (e.g., Fuse.js) found in src or package.json.

F4_creative_additions.evidence: No substantive creative feature beyond baseline matrix rendering; repo contains only core matrix implementation files.
F4_creative_additions.notes: No additional product features beyond requirements.

F_bonus_features.category_commentary: Submission focuses on core matrix implementation and does not materially extend into bonus feature scope.

G1_prioritization.evidence: Candidate focused on must-have matrix implementation (Summary.md:21-39), but build is broken due unresolved import path mismatch at src/app/matrix/page.tsx:3.
G1_prioritization.notes: Prioritization targeted the right feature area but stopped short of release-quality completion.

G2_pr_description.evidence: Submission summary explains implemented items and runtime expectations in Summary.md:20-43.
G2_pr_description.notes: Brief, useful documentation exists but lacks clear trade-off discussion and contains substantial spelling/clarity issues.

G_decision_making.category_commentary: Communication is present and useful, but execution quality (build reliability) weakens prioritization signal.

H1_commit_cadence.evidence: Three commits: 023a42c, bbc6b86, e6a0347 from `git log --oneline -n 8`.
H1_commit_cadence.notes: Shows incremental progress but limited cadence depth.

H2_message_quality.evidence: Messages are descriptive but informal and error-prone (e.g., bbc6b86, e6a0347).
H2_message_quality.notes: Some intent is clear, but message quality is not consistently professional.

H3_logical_progression.evidence: Commit order progresses from scaffold/content (023a42c) to implementation (bbc6b86) to summary update (e6a0347).

I1_ai_vision_planning.evidence: No repository documentation describing an in-product AI integration plan; Summary.md focuses on matrix implementation only.

I2_ai_implementation.evidence: No AI-related code paths, API calls, or scripts found in src/, scripts/, or docs/.

automatic_failure_reasons: Project does not build (`npm run build` fails)

top_strengths: Strong matrix transformation pipeline with dedicated normalization and quadrant logic utilities (`src/lib/matrix.ts:2-50`).
Scatter matrix visualization includes properly oriented axes, quadrant shading/labels, and useful tooltip content (`src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:53-87`).
Candidate expanded dataset to seven projects across varied departments and score ranges (`_content/projects/PRJ-001.md:2`, `_content/projects/PRJ-007.md:2`).
top_weaknesses: Production build fails due import path/case mismatch (`src/app/matrix/page.tsx:3` vs `src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx`).
PRD route scope is largely unimplemented: only `/matrix` route exists in `src/app`.
No design-token integration from tenant config; colors are hardcoded instead (`_content/config.json:8-18`, `src/Components/StrategyMatrix.tsx:55-58`).
standout_moments: Quadrant compliance is notably strong: logic boundaries and visual placement match PRD expectations.
qualitative_summary.hiring_signal: This submission shows the candidate can implement core data-to-visualization logic quickly and structure matrix-specific code reasonably well. The main risk is delivery reliability: a straightforward path/case import issue leaves the production build broken, and overall feature coverage is narrow. Best fit appears to be a junior-to-mid role with stronger release/checklist rigor and broader product-scope execution needed.
